Title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
Writer: Hayao Miyazaki (based on the manga by), Hayao Miyazaki (screenplay by), Cindy Davis (english language adaptation), Donald H. Hewitt (english language adaptation)
Actors: Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako Kyôda, Gorô Naya
Plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
